name: Intro to Cheese
description: Learn about different types of cheese and cheese-making processes.

lessons.name: Types of Cheese
lessons.description: Explore various types of cheese from around the world.

lessons.name: Cheese-Making Process
lessons.description: Understand the process of making cheese from milk.

lessons.name: Cheese Pairing
lessons.description: Learn about pairing different cheeses with wines and accompaniments.

name: Intro to Cheese Part 2
description: Learn about different types of cheese and cheese-making processes.

lessons.name: Types of Cheese
lessons.description: Explore various types of cheese from around the world.

lessons.name: Cheese-Making Process
lessons.description: Understand the process of making cheese from milk.

lessons.name: Cheese Pairing
lessons.description: Learn about pairing different cheeses with wines and accompaniments.

name: Intro to Surfing
description: Basic techniques and safety measures for surfing beginners.

lessons.name: Surfing Equipment
lessons.description: Learn about essential surfing equipment and gear.

lessons.name: Basic Surfing Techniques
lessons.description: Master the foundational techniques of surfing.

lessons.name: Ocean Safety
lessons.description: Understand ocean currents, tides, and safety precautions for surfers.

name: Intro to Wine Tasting
description: Discover the art of wine tasting and wine varieties.

lessons.name: Wine Tasting Basics
lessons.description: Learn the basic steps and techniques of wine tasting.

lessons.name: Wine Varieties
lessons.description: Explore different types of wine and their characteristics.

lessons.name: Food Pairing
lessons.description: Understand how to pair wines with different types of food.

name: Intro to Fortnite
description: Learn the basics of playing Fortnite and strategies for beginners.

lessons.name: Fortnite Basics
lessons.description: Get started with Fortnite: controls, gameplay, and objectives.

lessons.name: Basic Strategies
lessons.description: Learn basic strategies to improve your performance in Fortnite.

lessons.name: Building Techniques
lessons.description: Master the art of building structures for defense and offense.

name: Advanced Fortnite
description: Advanced gameplay tactics and strategies for experienced Fortnite players.

lessons.name: Advanced Building Techniques
lessons.description: Master advanced building techniques for competitive Fortnite play.

lessons.name: High-Level Strategies
lessons.description: Learn high-level strategies to dominate in Fortnite matches.

lessons.name: Survival Tactics
lessons.description: Develop survival skills to outlast opponents and win matches.

name: Web Development
description: Learn web development fundamentals including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

lessons.name: HTML Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to HTML syntax and structure.

lessons.name: CSS Fundamentals
lessons.description: Learn the basics of CSS for styling web pages.

lessons.name: JavaScript Essentials
lessons.description: Introduction to JavaScript programming language and its usage in web development.

name: Driving Primates
description: Study the behavior of primates and their driving abilities.

lessons.name: Primate Behavior
lessons.description: Understand the behavior and social structure of primates.

lessons.name: Primate Driving Skills
lessons.description: Investigate the cognitive abilities required for primates to drive.

lessons.name: Road Safety
lessons.description: Learn about road safety regulations and precautions for driving primates.
